name: Follower's
description: The **Follower's Cape** is a cape that was given out as part of the 15 Days of Minecraft celebrations, alongside the Purple Heart cape and the 15th Anniversary cape.
obtaining: Players could receive this cape by redeeming a code, which can be obtained by watching any Minecraft livestream on TikTok. This event started on May 15, 2024 and ended on May 31, 2024.
